description: Analyst view analyzing a line chart for storytelling insights.

input_schema.data_summary: Summary of a line chart over a certain time period.
input_schema.correlation_context: External events like promotions or market shifts may have influenced the data.
input_schema.user_goal: Understand what caused a shift in performance.

prompt_template: You're a {{voice_style}} examining a {{chart_type}} chart titled '{{chart_title}}'. The x-axis is {{x_axis}}, and the y-axis is {{y_axis}}. Highlight anomalies such as {{notable_points}}, include external context like '{{correlation_context}}', and tailor the message to help the user achieve the goal: '{{user_goal}}'.
